Meeting with Tek

Odense, Denmark • Jun 28, 2018

On June 28th, members of the Concurrency and Logic had a kickoff meeting with members of the Software Engineering section: Kati Kuusinen, Sanja Lazarova-Molnar, and Elena Markoska. At the meeting, we discussed future collaborations between SE@Tek and CL@IMADA, ranging shared research projects and shared lectures and industrial summer courses on Microservices and DevOps.

The Concurrency and Logic Group website is supported and hosted by the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science of the University of Southern Denmark
